snippet: More than two years after the collapse of the brokerage firm, James W. Giddens, the court-appointed trustee overseeing the return of customer money, announced that he was sending a final round of checks to make MF Global’s customers whole.
abstract: More than two years after the collapse of the brokerage firm, James W. Giddens, the court-appointed trustee overseeing the return of customer money, announced that he was sending a final round of checks to make MF Global’s customers whole.

headline.main: MF Global Customers to Be Paid Back in Full
